menuitem.name: _Script
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && dw.getFocus() != 'browser' && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html'

menuitem.name: _NoScript
menuitem.enabled: (dw.getActiveWindow(true) != null && dw.getActiveWindow(true).allowsEdits()) && dw.getFocus() != 'browser' && dw.getDocumentDOM() != null && dw.getDocumentDOM().getParseMode() == 'html'
